{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SonicWALL |model=SonicPoint |revision=-Ne (APL21-06E) |asin=B00TCH8K1S, B0040VI1P6, B0040VK9OW |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=EoL (10/01/2020) |fcc_date=05/18/2010 |fcc_id=QWU-06E |ic_id=4408A-06E |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=two-pronged |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132;AR9132;AR9132-BC1E, 6R0E42165.1C, 0935, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M29W128GH-70N6 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=46V32M16-5B |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ-45 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132;AR9132-BC1E, 6R0E42165.1C, 0935, CHINA; |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9106;AR9106-AL1A, Q1G400.1C, 0943, KOREA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA <!-- + RP-TNC (N-DR) --> |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116;88E1116-NNC1; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=GaAs IRED & Photo-transistor;Toshiba;TLP781;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;Nexperia;74LVCH244APW;;2;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, 0.5A Glass Passivated Bridge Rectifier;WTE Power Semiconductors;B6S;;2;,,, Dual Notebook Power Supply 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild;FDS6982AS;;2;,,, Dual 2-Phase Synchronous Step-Down Switching Controller;Linear Technology;LTC3850;;1;,,, PoE IEEE 802.3af PD Interface w/Integrated Switching Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC4267-3;;1; |flags=external antennas |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:17:C5 |oui_eth=00:17:C5 }} {{TagLine|Secure Remote Wireless Access Point}} :[https://www.sonicguard.com/SonicPoint-N-Series.asp Product page]{{•}}[https://www.sonicwall.com/support/knowledge-base/sonicpoint-n-ni-ne-ndr-overview-features-and-specifications/170503348982115/ Support page]
*[http://www.sonicwall.com/app/projects/file_downloader/document_lib.php?t=PG&id=443 Getting Started Guide] {{See also|SonicWALL|Senao}}
*[https://bugs.openwrt.org/index.php?do=details&task_id=1000 ''Support'' on '''OpenWrt/LEDE Project''']
===Models=== :[https://sonicwall.rightanswers.com/portal/app/portlets/results/onsitehypermedia/090170801553932.png?linkToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzb25pY3dhbGwiLCJleHAiOjE2NDM2OTkxMjgsImlhdCI6MTYxMjE2MzEyOH0.S-Yp_B3qvf904SOlTSMK9Pg_jscNUdq29RNf8ZDuaFw Specifications] • [https://www.cnet.com/products/dell-sonicwall-sonicpoint-ne-dual-band-wireless-access-point-series/ C|Net]
*SonicPoint-N (Dual Band) *SonicPoint-Ni (Internal Antennas) *SonicPoint-Ne (External Antennas) *SonicPoint-N-DR (Dual Radio)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9132 [[MIPS 24K]] (@400MHz) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) DDR *Storage: 16MB NOR Flash *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9132/AR9106 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *Power: 12V, 1.5A via two-prong connector
==Images== <gallery> File:SonicPoint-Ne Top.jpg|Top File:SonicPoint-Ne Bottom.jpeg|Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
